mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_device_stats (full_short_url, gid, date, cnt, device, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{linkDeviceStats.fullShortUrl}, #{linkDeviceStats.gid}, #{linkDeviceStats.date}, #{linkDeviceStats.cnt}, #{linkDeviceStats.device}, NOW(), NOW(), 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + #{linkDeviceStats.cnt}, update_time = NOW()
